title: Enhanced Catalytic Centres by RuO2 Addition to CuFe2O4 Cathode Catalyst towards Rechargeable Lithium-Air Battery: Influence of CO2 on the Li-O2 Battery Performances
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE01202J, Paper
Sharafudeen Pamangadan C, Perumal Elumalai
The oxygen reduction reaction and oxygen evolution reaction (ORR/OER) kinetics of the inverse-spinel CuFe2O4 catalyst is enhanced by the addition of very little quantity of RuO2. It turned out that...
